description: The past2k experiment extends the past1000 simulation back in time to include the first millenium CE. Main forcings: trace gases, volcanoes, solar variability, land-use. The past1000 forcings data sets include the first millennium, except for land-use.  For the latter, a linear ramp-up to 850CE values is recommended.
keywords: PMIP, Tier 3, last two millennia, past2k

requirements.description: Last two millennia, run for 1849 years
requirements.label: 01-1849 1849yrs
